name: Power Defense (Kale & Pearl)
description:
Defend the Tower!

Defend the tower in this cute but challenging tower defense - RPG game. Instructions should be on Level 1 - Good Luck!

Speedrunning the game? Let us know! Send us a video and we'll put you on the table below.

Also, join our Discord Server!

SPEEDRUN SUBMISSIONS RankNameTimeLink 1 rollingcrow 26:48 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LexG0e3ECVY
